alert.note: Alert for Clare (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clare County through 445 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Clare. This storm was nearly stationary and producing torrential rainfall along with penny size hail. Localized flooding may begin within the next hour. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clare... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
